0.Name: Destruction
0.Desc: Deals outstanding amounts of <color=#f29e38ff>damage</color> and possesses great <color=#f29e38ff>survivability</color>. Suitable for various combat scenarios

1.Name: The Hunt
1.Desc: Deals extraordinary amounts of <color=#f29e38ff>single-target damage</color>. The main damage dealer against Elite Enemies

2.Name: Erudition
2.Desc: Deals remarkable amounts of <color=#f29e38ff>multi-target damage</color>. The main damage dealer against groups of enemies

3.Name: Harmony
3.Desc: Applies <color=#f29e38ff>buffs</color> to allies to improve the team's combat capacities

4.Name: Nihility
4.Desc: Applies <color=#f29e38ff>debuffs</color> to enemies to reduce their combat capacities

5.Name: Preservation
5.Desc: Possesses powerful <color=#f29e38ff>defensive</color> abilities to protect allies in various ways

6.Name: Abundance
6.Desc: <color=#f29e38ff>Heals</color> allies and restores HP to the team
